data.title: Hotel in Aruba
data.meta_description: Enjoy an unforgettable vacation on the island paradise of Aruba at the Barceló Aruba hotel in Palm Beach. Book now!

Resident at the destination Senior (65 plus) Large family Millennials Army You are in Barceló Barceló Aruba

An exclusive Caribbean beachfront oasis

The Barceló Aruba***** (5-star) hotel (belonging to the Barceló Hotel Group and formerly the Occidental Grand Aruba) transports its guests to a unique beachfront experience in Palm Beach, on the Caribbean island of Aruba. It stands out for its spectacular sports and leisure activities available to guests that are closely linked to the delightful beach where the hotel stands.

Guests can watch truly idyllic sunrises and sunsets from its 373 rooms, which all feature a balcony.

This resort provides the opportunity to enjoy maximum relaxation, whether that be a refreshing dip in its spectacular swimming pool or sunbathing in the stunning gardens. It also offers exciting sporting activities, with tennis courts, supervised activities and a variety of water sports on the beach, such as snorkeling, diving and beach volleyball.

The rich and varied restaurants the hotel will satisfy the most discerning palates with international dishes, buffets, à la carte menus and snacks, served in its 6 restaurants and 3 bars. Leisure and evening entertainment also take priority, from the fabulous casino to the DJ sessions.

The Barceló Aruba is a stunning all inclusive resort that also contains a boutique hotel, the Royal Level Barceló Aruba, which offers all the luxury and sophistication you could wish for, with unique and exclusive services. Paradise during any season of the year.

The 5-star Barceló Aruba hotel transports guests to a unique, seafront experience, on the Caribbean island of Aruba. Discover the Barceló Aruba hotel in Palm Beach, a privileged location with calm waters and white sand to enjoy unique moments. Guests can watch truly idyllic sunrises and sunsets from its 373 rooms, which all feature a balcony or terrace. The wonderful Barceló Aruba resort, in Palm Beach, is home to the Royal Level Barceló Aruba, a boutique hotel that offers a luxurious and sophisticated experience, with unique and exclusive services. A true paradise! Read more All-Inclusive Vacations at Barceló Aruba Hotel The Barceló Aruba Hotel is a beautiful all-inclusive family resort in Aruba. The rich and assorted dining choices of its 6 restaurants and 3 bars will satisfy the most demanding palates with international cuisine, buffet, à la carte service, and appetizers. This resort offers the opportunity to enjoy maximum relaxation, either with a refreshing swim in its spectacular pool or basking in the Caribbean sun. Located in the heart of the Caribbean, the Barceló Aruba Hotel stands out for its spectacular sports offering, linked to the heavenly beach where it's located. It's the perfect spot for leisure and nightlife, with a fabulous casino and live music. Those who celebrate their wedding at the Barceló Aruba Hotel will find an ideal setting and top services for your special day. Read less J E Irausquin Blvd 83, Palm Beach, Aruba Queen Beatrix International Airport 7.2 miles Golf Course 3.1 miles Faro California / California Light House Barceló Aruba Hotel Location Barceló Aruba Hotel, located on the beachfront of Palm Beach,is the perfect place to enjoy the sun and sand of the Caribbean. Set in a prime location, this hotel offers incredible views of a breathtaking beach. This Caribbean destination boasts white sand beaches, turquoise water, and a tropical landscape, ideal for those who want to enjoy their honeymoon in Aruba. For the more adventurous of our guests, this Caribbean island offers many possibilities, such as a visit to the California Lighthouse, a symbol of the island, or the Arikok National Park, an immense ecological area known for its breathtaking scenery, natural beauty, caves... This park is also where you can explore historic gold mines. The spectacular butterfly farm promises visitors a once-in-a-lifetime experience with nature. It is, without a doubt, a "must-see" for anyone visiting Aruba along with the Casibari Rock Formations, one of the most fascinating places to visit. Beaches Palm Beach, 109 yards Arashi Beach, 3.5 miles Baby Beach, 18.6 miles Surfside Beach, 5.6 miles Hadicurari Beach, 1.6 miles Eagle Beach, 1.9 miles Places of Interest Arikok National Park, 10.6 miles Gold Mines, 7.5 miles Aloe Factory and Museum, 3.1 miles Fort Zoutman Historical Museum, 5 miles What to See California Lighthouse, 4.3 miles Butterfly Farm, 0.6 miles Casibari Rock Formations, 6.8 miles Directions Queen Beatrix International Airport, 6.8 miles - 16 minutes Why choose Barceló Aruba hotel? Exclusive Resort on Palm Beach Location Ideal for families Cuisine All-Inclusive Royal Level Thanks to its prime location, Barceló Aruba is a direct-access beach hotel that invites guests to experience a paradise of white sand and turquoise water in complete comfort. It is the ideal hotel for family vacations in Aruba, featuring a fun daily program of pool and beach activities, a Kids Club for the little ones, and a wide range of sports activities. This magnificent hotel on the island of Aruba has 7 specialty restaurants (Mexican, Japanese, International Buffet, Italian), including an exclusive Royal Level restaurant. The Barceló Aruba Hotel is an all-inclusive hotel where guests can enjoy food, beverages, entertainment programs, activities, and on-site facilities without worrying about a thing. The Barceló Aruba Resort is home to an exclusive boutique hotel: the Royal Level Barceló Aruba Hotel. By booking at the Royal Level, guests can access exceptional luxury service. This select concept offers exclusive amenities, personalized attention, private areas, and first-class benefits. To enjoy these services, you must book one of the Royal Level rooms. Private service: personalized check-in, concierge, nightly turn-down service. Access to the Royal Level Lounge Priority reservation in à la carte restaurants Royal Level Bar on the beach Rooms at the Barceló Aruba hotel Barceló Aruba Hotel accommodation guarantees the perfect all-inclusive vacation where enjoyment is ensured thanks to the comfort of its rooms with a balcony or terrace. This hotel overlooking the beach in Aruba has magnificent rooms, including options with hot tubs, connecting rooms, and the exclusive Royal Level rooms at the Barceló Aruba Resort in Palm Beach. A truly unique experience My Barceló Exclusivity Enjoy individual and personal attention during your stay. A truly unique experience My Barceló Exclusivity Enjoy individual and personal attention during your stay. Facilities and services at the Barceló Aruba hotel At the Barceló Aruba Hotel, guests enjoy a perfect all-inclusive vacation in Aruba with the best of services and facilities: dining venues to suit all palates, swimming pools, sports and entertainment programs for the whole family, and exclusive services so you don't have to worry about a thing during your stay. Cuisine To delight guests at the highest culinary level, the 5-star Barceló Aruba Hotel offers a comprehensive dining offering with 6 restaurants and 2 bars. Restaurants at this Aruba resort include an exclusive, Royal Level restaurant. All-Inclusive At the Barceló Aruba All-Inclusive hotel guests will find everything needed so they won't have to worry about a thing other than relaxing and having fun with entertainment programs, activities, and an array of facilities. Pools and beach access The Barceló Aruba Hotel features a swimming pool in the shape of a lake surrounded by rocks and tropical palm trees, giving you the feeling of sunbathing in the middle of nature. At the swimming pool of this Aruba resort, guests will find heather umbrellas and hammocks where they can sunbathe, relax or enjoy an aperitif or cocktail. In addition, this area of the hotel has 2 hydromassage pools that are perfect for disconnecting and slowing down during your vacation. Royal Level Our Royal Level offers a service of exceptional luxury and amenities in rooms and suites that are almost unimaginable. In addition to enjoying everything the hotel's all-inclusive package offers, with the Royal Level, guests will have exclusive amenities and services designed for even the most demanding guests. Whether your trip is for vacation or business, our Royal Level at Barceló Aruba will amaze you throughout your stay. Weddings The Barceló Aruba hotel is the perfect setting to enjoy beach weddings in Aruba. The hotel offers personalized service, a professional wedding planning team, and complimentary lodging for the newlyweds on their Aruba honeymoon. Meetings and Events With 19,400 square feet of space and 4 meeting rooms, the Barceló Aruba hotel is the perfect place for holding different meetings and events, both personal and professional. Among other amenities, these rooms offer equipment for audiovisual presentations and internet connection. Other Services Sports The Barceló Aruba hotel, in Palm Beach, has a wide range of sports both on grounds and in the immediate vicinity, thanks to being located in front of one of the most beautiful seabeds in the world and a paradisaical beach. Tennis lovers have 2 tennis courts available with lighting and the option of taking private classes. In addition, it is also possible to rent scuba diving equipment, request diving lessons, and earn international certificates near the hotel. The resort also offers water polo, water gymnastics, darts, petanque, and even kayaking (depending on availability), as well as golf thanks to the 18-hole golf course that is just a 10-minute drive from Palm Beach. Health and wellness For those guests who wish to receive a professional massage or some beauty treatment, the Barceló Aruba Hotel Spa provides these services, with prior reservation. And if you want to stay in shape while on vacation, as well as the extensive sports facilities provided by the resort, you can also use a gym with treadmills, elliptical trainers and weights area, including free weights and weights machines. Yes, Barceló Aruba has a spectacular natural pool in the shape of a lake surrounded by rocks, tropical palm trees, and 2 jacuzzis. You'll find more information about this and other facilities on the hotel's website. How much does it cost to stay at Barceló Aruba? Prices at Barceló Aruba may vary depending on the stay (dates, hotel conditions, etc.). Please choose your dates on our website to see your rate. What is there to do at Barceló Aruba? Barceló Aruba has different services and activities, such as 7 restaurants, 3 bars, 4 meeting rooms, a massage service, beauty treatments, 2 tennis courts, an activity program, entertainment shows, live music, and a casino with 5 gaming tables, to mention a few. What are the parking options offered at the Barceló Aruba? The Barceló Aruba offers parking at no extra cost for hotel guests. Is the Barceló Aruba adapted for guests with disabilities? Yes, the Barceló Aruba hotel is designed for people with reduced mobility. Ask the reception staff about our adapted services and facilities. Is the Barceló Aruba a pet friendly hotel? No, the Barceló Aruba does not allow guests to bring their pets. What are the check-in and check-out times at the Barceló Aruba? Check-in at Barceló Aruba is from 4:00 pm, while check-out is at noon. Does the Barceló Aruba offer food and beverage alternatives for guests with food sensitivites? Yes, the Barceló Aruba offers food and drink options for guests with intolerances to food. Is there a charge for Wi-Fi internet connection at the Barceló Aruba? The Wi-Fi connection for guests of Barceló Aruba is free of charge. Does Barceló Aruba offer room service? The Barceló Aruba has room service for hotel guests. In the hotel you will find all the information you need regarding our food and drink options for room service, along with prices, hours, and more. What is the minimum age in order to enter the spa & wellness area at the Barceló Aruba? Do the spa facilities have an additional cost for hotel guests? Are children allowed in? The minimum age to access the spa & wellness area at Barceló Aruba is 18. Entrance to the spa does come with an additional cost for hotel guests. Please check our rates.
